data.eml:eml: The genus Trachionus Haliday, 1833 (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Alysiinae) new for China, with description of four new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cui, Qian, van Achterberg, Cornelis, Tan, Jiang-Li, Chen, Xue-Xin (2015): The genus Trachionus Haliday, 1833 (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Alysiinae) new for China, with description of four new species. ZooKeys 512: 19-37, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.512.9759, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.512.9759
